sourcesContent:
import { ChakraProvider,Box ,Container,Flex,CSSReset,GridItem,Grid,Text,extendTheme} from '@chakra-ui/react'
import { } from '@chakra-ui/icons'
import Navbar from './components/navBar';


const theme = extendTheme({
  fonts: {
    body: 'Arial , sans-serif',
    heading: 'Arial Rounded MT Bold, sans-serif',
  },
});


function App() {
  return (
    <ChakraProvider theme={theme}>
      <CSSReset />
      <Flex direction="column" height="100vh" bgColor="#F7F7F8">
        <Navbar />
        <Flex flex="1">
          {/* Adjust the Box styling as needed */}
          <Box width="100%" mx="2" my="2" align="center" justify="center">
            <Grid templateColumns="13% 62% 25%" h="100%" w="100%">
              <GridItem colSpan={1} borderLeftRadius="20" bgColor="#999999" mr="2">
                <Box>
                  <Container mt="5">
                    <Text fontSize={"18"} color="white" margin="auto" as='b'>
                      
                      List chat history
                    </Text>
                  </Container>
                </Box>
              </GridItem>
              <GridItem colSpan={1} bgColor="#F7F7F8">
                <Box>
                  <Container
                    bgColor={"#646464"}
                    maxW="full"
                    h="50px"
                    alignItems="center"
                    justifyItems="center"
                    display={"flex"}
                  >
                    <Text fontSize={"18"} color="white" margin="auto" as='b'>
                      
                      New chat room
                    </Text>
                  </Container>
                </Box>
              </GridItem>
              <GridItem
                colSpan={1}
                borderRightRadius="20"
                bgColor="#999999"
                ml="2"
              >
                <Box>
                  <Container mt="5">
                    <Text fontSize={"18"} color="white" margin="auto" as='b'>
                     
                      Future Features
                    </Text>
                  </Container>
                </Box>
              </GridItem>
            </Grid>
          </Box>
        </Flex>
      </Flex>
    </ChakraProvider>
  );
}

export default App;
